import React from "react" class Dimensions extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { width: "", projection: "", inputStage: "1", } } setWidth = (e) => { this.setState({ width: e.target.value }) this.props.setWidth(e.target.value) } setProjection = (e) => { this.setState({ projection: e.target.value }) this.props.setProjection(e.target.value) } advanceUserInput = () => { this.props.setInputStage("1") } handleBack = () => { this.props.setStage("1") } render() { return (
this.handleBack()}> Back

Product Type: {this.props.selected}

Additional Product: {this.props.additionalprod.name == "" ? "You haven't selected an additional product" : " " + this.props.additionalprod.name}

Additional Product: {this.props.additionalprod2 == "" ? "You haven't selected an additional product" : " " + this.props.additionalprod2}

Width
Projection

{this.state.projection == "" ? "" : "You have selected " + this.state.projection + " projection"}

{this.state.width == "" ? "" : "You have selected " + this.state.width + " width"}

this.advanceUserInput()}> Next
) } } export default Dimensions
